segments.text: I like the Honda Accord you showed me before . I think it's more practical for my needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , sir . You are making a good choice . Honda has made a lot of design improvements in the new Accord .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does it come with standard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On all our new cars , the standards include
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cruise control ? I don't like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's dangerous . What if I can't turn it off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir , I know some of our customers are concerned about cruise control . But Honda has never had a single cruise control malfunction that led to an accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish it didn't have cruise control . My wife doesn't like it either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , sir , you don't have to use it . You can turn it on or off . If you don't want to use it , you just never turn it on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose . And What about the sunroof ? Is that standard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , the sunroof is optional , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
